H0.text: What Russian word means ‘restructuring’, particularly in an economic context. Reforma

H1.text: What Russian word means ‘restructuring’, particularly in an economic context. Restrukturizatsiya

H2.text: What Russian word means ‘restructuring’, particularly in an economic context. Modernizatsiya

H3.text: What Russian word means ‘restructuring’, particularly in an economic context. Perestroka

A4.text: Perestroika (PERR-ə-STROY-kə; Russian: перестройка, romanized: perestroyka, IPA: [pʲɪrʲɪˈstrojkə] ) was a political reform movement... referring to the restructuring of the political economy of the Soviet Union in an attempt to end the Era of Stagnation.
